jacobshack.com
==============

Website for jacobsHack!

Build Instructions: (NPM required)

``` 
  $> npm install -g grunt-cli bower jade mocha
  $> gem install compass

  $> npm install
  $> bower install
  $> grunt build

  # you can find the generated files in the dist folder
  # alternatively you can start the server running

  $> grunt serve
```
